resources.string:
1.0.0 - Initial release!
• View a season overview
• See the results for all F1 races from 2019 dating back to 2000
• See the qualifying results for Q1, Q2 and Q3 for all races
• As of May 2020 it is unclear what the 2020 season will look like, so I cannot guarantee that new races will be updated live

1.0.2 - Tidying up
• Changed app flow to default to the season overview screens rather than the 2019 season
• Changed theme throughout so it can be more customisable down the road

2.0.0 - Back to the beginning
• Overhauled UI for viewing the history of F1
• Flashback now supports all races from 1950 to 2019
• See a breakdown of the constructor standings per race
• Fixed some blank spaces in 2017 race data
• Updated components to 2.0.1

3.0.0 - Championship standings
• Added championship standings options to all seasons
• Added daily sync for current
• Updated firebase dependencies

4.0.0 - New look and feel
• Shifted app design over to a Material Design 2 inspired UI
• Improved network state management
• The usual disclaimer of general data patching and bug fixes

4.1.0 - Dark mode!
• Added dark mode toggle to settings
• Added grid penalty indicator to race qualifying view

4.3.0 - News feed!
• Added news feed to the app
• Added ability to toggle preferred news sources
• Added status for race data being synchronised

4.3.5 - Shuffle time
• Moved news to it\'s own screen
• Fixed race status oversight in prep for 2020 season start
• Changed loading stack to only show spinner and not skeleton views on initial load
• Tidied up network logging
• Fixed pit lane starts not being filtered properly in qualifying view
• Updated swiperefesh to 1.1.0
• Updated components to 2.1.0
• Updated utilities to 2.0.1
• Updated firebase analytics to 17.4.3
• Updated firebase crashlytics to 2.10.1

4.4.1 - 2020 season start
• Addressed some bugs that have risen due to season starting
• Fixed issue with partial qualifying data not displaying when race data is unavailable
• Added setting to expand season list to full height by default
• Fixed some wording oversights with races being scheduled in the future or past
• Fixed optional message being displayed
• Moved app banner position to pinned position at the top of the display

4.4.3 - Track images
• Added track layout images to some of the modern tracks
• Added qualifying and race data distinction with data availability
• Added constructor colour bar to qualifying and race details to make driver\'s constructor more obvious
• Fixed DNF label showing when driver finishes normally
• Fixed message label appearing in top of screen properly

4.4.6 - Driver statuses
• Updated layout for driver season status to be less confusing
• Fixed theming bugs on maps links
• Fixed incorrect round being used as reference message for driver stats

4.5.0 - Behind the scenes
• Backend fixes to data management
• Added notification for when results are being pulled
• Fix for Perez qualifying data showing up in Round 4 2020 data
• Fix for closing driver season dropdown collapsing again
• Moved constructor color bars to edge

4.6.1
• Added RaceFans.net as a supported news site in the news tab
• Bringing project dependencies up to date
• Backend prep for driver career breakdown
• Fixed some race data format errors from races in 1962
• Improved in-app experience during a sync event after a race

4.7.0 - Driver overviews
• Adds driver overview. See a history of any drivers performance in F1!
• Fixed edge case crash in driver season data updating whilst app is open
• Usual assortment of bugfixes and improvements

4.7.2
• Fixes issue with 2020 Racing Point penalty not being shown in the preview
• Fixed position delta always being 0 for podium sitters
• Fixed DNF label showing up for not finished status

4.7.3
• Fixes issue with driver stats qualifying data taking into account DNS
• Adds ability to customise bar animations throughout the app
• Fixes typos throughout error messages

4.7.4
• Fixes issue with track layout displayed in 2020 Sakhir Grand Prix race
• Migrates to Firebase crashlytics
• Usual assortment of bugfixes and improvements

4.7.5
• Adds setting option to open news articles in external browser by default
• Fixes crash in certain seasons in the 1980s
• Fixes theming issue with circuit icons that are not fully supported

4.7.8
• Adds wikipedia links to driver overview, race and circuit information screens
• Fixes some constructor penalties not being applied to disqualified teams throughout F1

4.8.0
• Handles constructors championship starting in 1958 properly
• Tweaked layout of Driver Overview season navigation

5.0.0
• Constructor overview! View a simplistic history of a constructor in F1
• Fixes more than 5 drivers under constructor not stacking properly

5.1.0
• Migrated news away to RSS feed - Configure predefined or your own RSS feeds for formula 1 news
• Fixed typos in settings panel
• Fixed edge case crash in 1990s qualifying data

5.2.1
• Increases minimum support to Android 6.0 Marshmellow (API 23)
• Adds initial landscape support and a custom view for the home screen
• Changes RSS news animation and close animation to reduce crash rates
• Fixes crash when "Show on map" is pressed on certain devices
• Fixes some theming issues for new RSS feed section of the app
• Updated firebase analytics to 18.0.0
• Updated firebase auth to 20.0.1
• Updated firebase firestore to 22.0.0
• Updated firebase crashlytics to 17.3.0

5.3.0
• Added notification support! Get notified for races and qualifying sessions 30 minutes before
• Fixed theming gaps in Android 6.0 and 6.1
Receive notifications 30 minutes before a race starts. Configure them here
Receive notifications 30 minutes before qualifying starts. Configure them here
Turn off the app notifications by turning them off in your settings
Pick the speed of the points bar animations throughout the app
Show the lap time delta alongside the qualifying time when displaying qualifying results
Shows the grid penalty that a driver has in the qualifying view
When clicking the seasons tab, the sheet will default to going full screen rather than half height
Toggle if the favourites section inside the seasons list is expanded by default
Toggle if the all section inside the seasons list is expanded by default
Select the view type that you want to view race information in
About the application and the developer
What I want to add to this app in the future
Send device information and crash stack traces to the developer
Your crash reporting preference will be applied once the app has restarted
Send the developer an email with any suggestions you may have. Alternately turn on shake to report and shake your device
Shake the app to report a bug or a feature?
Shake the app at any time to screenshot and send me any bugs, issues, or suggestions you may have for this app!
Your shake to report preference will be applied once the app has restarted
A big thank you to everyone listed below for helping make this app possible!

Special thanks to
 - Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
 - Icons made by Vitaly Gorbachev from www.flaticon.com
 - Animations made by LottieFiles from www.lottiefiles.com
 - Animations made by Abhishek Kaushal from www.lottiefiles.com

 If we've missed anyone or anything please let me know

Flashback - Privacy Policy

Jordan Fisher built the Flashback app. This SERVICE is provided by Jordan Fisher at no cost and is intended for use as is.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.

If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.

The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app

  • Google Play Services
  • Firebase Analytics
  • Crashlytics

Log Data

I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called a crash report. This crash report may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics. You can opt out of this crash reporting in the settings

Service Providers

I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service-related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Security

I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security. I have taken steps to aid in this security, please feel free to email me if you wish me to provide more information

Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

Children’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I will be able to do necessary actions.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at thementalgoose@gmail.com about your issues.

This privacy policy page was created at privacypolicytemplate.net and modified/generated by App Privacy Policy Generator
Statistics are shown as of the %s round of the grand prix, the %s. %d rounds to go
It will also host round %s of this season
It will also host the %s rounds of this season
Cannot find app. Coordinates have been copied to clipboard
This season has not started yet, please check back after the first race to see the results!
We don\'t yet have any data on this season yet, please check back later while we work on getting this
This race has not yet happened, please check back after the race to see the results
We don\'t have this information yet, it should be available after the race (race results usually take between 2 – 6 hours to appear, but can take longer)
Unfortunately we don\'t have any information for this yet, please check back you have an internet connection and try again
A network error occurred! Please check you are connected to the internet and try again
A network error occurred and we weren\'t able to find any articles. Please check your internet connection or try again later
The constructors championship did not start until 1958
We can\'t find any information on this circuit.
We can\'t find any information on this driver.
We can\'t find any information on this constructor.
Here\'s what\'s changed since you last updated
